sense.def:
The tempo of an event
je hitrost, s katero se nekaj dogaja;

seg.quote: Events had been moving at an equally dramatic tempo.

sense.def:
The tempo of a piece of music
je hitrost, s katero izvajamo glasbeno delo;

seg.quote: Fluctuations of tempo are possible in a romantic piece.
...the light-footed tempos of the Magic Flute.
